mapper.select: SELECT series.id, modifiable_name as `name`, series.author, series.over_status, series.`status`, series.love, series.`profile`, series.last_read_time, series.num, series.files_id, series.cover FROM series INNER JOIN files ON series.files_id = files.id AND files.deleted = 1 WHERE series.deleted = 1 AND series.id = #{id}
